scripts.say: Persistent even to the end... Who would've thought she'd scuttle herself... Now she's gonna make us look like the bad guys!
...There's no such thing as a good or bad side in war, Achilles.
We don't have any need for Cumberland to come anymore... I'll just inform our allies that... Graf Spee has been sunk.
Alright. Then we should start heading... Ajax? You okay?
Go on ahead, I'll catch up with you.
...Alrighty then. I'll take it slow so you've got time.
In reality, Cumberland was the only one behind us. I lied about Ark Royal and Renown, you see. Ahahah...
But even supposing you were to defeat us, your defeat would have been set in stone the moment you docked at this port.
...It's not like me to be emotional in front of my fallen enemies like this. When I get back home, I'm going to harass Exeter some more.
But still, I'm grateful, Admiral Graf Spee. It's thanks to you that I managed to have such an... enjoyable time. Ahahah...
